ingredients.ingredient: 2 cups vegetable oil, or as needed

cookingTips: Blanch green beans for 2-3 minutes before breading to ensure they cook through while exterior crisps
Pat dry thoroughly after blanching to remove excess water and prevent oil splatter
Fry at 350°F in batches to maintain temperature; green beans need only 1-2 minutes
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help me balance blanching and frying time so green beans are tender inside with a crispy, golden breaded coating.
